name: PMS Pending Report
query:
SELECT
    COUNT(CASE WHEN e.appraisal_category IS NOT NULL AND e.status = 'Active' THEN 1 END) AS 'Total Employees',
    COUNT(CASE WHEN e.appraisal_category IS NOT NULL AND e.status = 'Active' AND p.employee_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS 'Total PMS'
FROM
    `tabEmployee` e
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPerformance Appraisal` p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
